item.description:
Let's get out for a fall hike!

Mt. Monadnock. It's been done... a lot, but it does offer a variety of trails and a lots of rock outcrops at the top for wind protected lunch. Not to mention the terrific view to enjoy the fall colors!

Check it out: Monadnock State Park

Route 124
Jaffrey, NH 03452
Phone: 603-532-8862
Directions

We're meeting in front of the Visitor's Center near the Park Head Quarters. Here is the map.
http://www.nhstatepar...

MOTHER NATURE: THE HIKE IS ON!!

Jaffrey NH Weather


GETTING THERE: It's a hike getting to this hike, so let others know in your RSVP if you can offer a ride or need a ride and from where.

FASHION AND ACCESSORIES:
Hey, I don't care much what you look like, just want you to be safe and have a good time. Autumn hiking in New England spells LAYERS! Avoid cotton - that means avoid jeans and cotton under Tees! Cool weather stuff like a wool/fleece and a windbreaker. Hiking boots, avoid sneakers!

BACK WOODS FINE DINING:
Lots of water or healthy fluids; 2-3 quarts, but use your own experience. Bring trail snacks and light lunch for eating at the peak. You will be forever judged upon the contents of your lunch box.

COST: You will have to bribe the park rangers $3 to park.

ORGANIZER: Tim

Thanks to Michael Blair from the Random Group Of Hikers for these great links:

The Hiker Responsibility Code

Leave No Trace Principles


STAY TUNED: [update]
We're meeting in front of the Visitor's Center near the Park Head Quarters. 10:30 am sharp.

Here is the map.
http://www.nhstatepar...
item.name: Picnic On The Peak
